Content.Name: Community Housing List
Content.Title: Community Housing List
Content.Abstract: The community list is a collection of apartment complexes for student-families, non-traditional students and/or continuing education students.
Content.BodyCopy:
Please note: this list represents the latest information we received from the complexes listed below. If you find any information to be incomplete or inaccurate, please e-mail us at housing@byui.edu.

Jump to Subsidized Housing Units.

    Continually Listed Apartment Complexes

    May or may not have openings.
    Key for Rental Type / Codes:*

    (1) One Bedroom (2) Two Bedroom (3) Three Bedroom (A) Furnished (B) Unfurnished (C) Utilities Included

    (c) Some Utilities Included (D) Internet (E) Cable TV (F) Washer & Dryer Included (G) Washer & Dryer Hookups

    (H) Laundry Facilities (I) Pets Allowed
